scenery noun [U]

B1 the general appearance of the natural environment, especially when it is beautiful: beautiful/breathtaking/spectacular scenery They stopped at the top of the hill to admire the scenery.
More examplesFewer examplesThe scenery really was beautiful.The majestic Montana scenery will leave you breathless.This postcard doesn't do justice to the wonderful scenery.This area has some of the most awesome scenery.You drive through the most incredible scenery to get there.
